structure.unit: ARTICLE CV. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY STS OVERSIGHT TASK FORCE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1563. Terms of Office.
All members shall serve for two years and may be reappointed thereafter for successive two-year terms. Members may be removed in accordance with the provisions of of the Code of Miami-Dade County. Vacancies on the Task Force shall be filled in the same manner by which Task Force members were appointed.
